DOC.criteria: Patients undergo coronary angiography No previous statin use Age > 18 year old No PDE51 use past 6 month Patients Acute Coronary Syndrome Patients Cardiogenic shock Patients > 30 % coronary stenosis Patients unexplained muscle pain Patients acute liver disease Patients receive immunosuppressant therapy , azoles , macrolide antibiotic , niacin , Larginine Patients serum creatinine > 2.0 Patients total cholesterol > 200 mmol/l Patients current statin therapy clinically indicate statin therapy
